mapper.select: select a.lesson_apply_attendance_status as attendanceStatus, b.lesson_no as "lesson.no", b.lesson_name as "lesson.name", c.user_name as "user.name", b.lesson_date as "lesson.date", b.lesson_time as "lesson.time" from helf_lesson_apply a, helf_lesson b, helf_users c where a.lesson_no = b.lesson_no and b.user_id = c.user_id and a.user_id = #{value}
